trans-unit.source: Activate to also show entries for the activity that do not have any events with actual participation of this person
trans-unit.target: Activer pour afficher également les données de l'activité qui n'ont pas d'événements comportant la participation effective de cette personne.

show unrelated attendance-entries for an activity that are not linked to the child of interest
load all records, not only the ones from the last 6 months

How many children have an unknown presence or absence status
The heading for the view showing the Attendance Register

trans-unit.source: Record attendance for an activity on a certain day. Optimized for smartphones.
trans-unit.target: Faire l'appel pour une activité à un jour donné. Optimisé pour l'utilisation sur smartphones.

trans-unit.source: Manage "recurring activities" for which you regularly record attendance. You can assign participants and users to these activities and analyze their attendance across time.
trans-unit.target: Gérez les "activités récurrentes" pour lesquelles vous faites régulièrement l'appel. Vous pouvez affecter des participants à ces activités et analyser leur présence dans le temps.

trans-unit.source: Document attendance totals for a whole month that were collected on paper.
trans-unit.target: Documenter les totaux de présences pour un mois entier qui ont été collectées sur papier.

trans-unit.source: Cases absent multiple times in the given week
trans-unit.target: Absents à de multiples reprises sur la semaine sélectionnée

trans-unit.note: The participant of a group, e.g. a school
The attendance of a participant, e.g. a student
Placeholder if no absences are visible in dashboar

trans-unit.source: This section displays historical activities that have been archived.
trans-unit.target: This section displays historical activities that have been archived.

trans-unit.note: School demo name that is connected with a school name
School demo name that is connected with a school name
School demo name order for connecting the school name and (High) School

trans-unit.target: Poursuit son éducation hors du projet

trans-unit.note: Label for the start date of a relation

trans-unit.source: The date a child joins a school
trans-unit.target: Date où l'enfant rejoint une école
trans-unit.note: Description of the start date of a relation
Label for the end date of a relation

trans-unit.source: The date of a child leaving the school
trans-unit.target: Date de départ d'un enfant de l'école

trans-unit.target: pas de participant sans observation récente

trans-unit.target: pas de participant avec une observation récente

Subtitle informing the user that these are the entities without recent reports

trans-unit.target: inclut les participants avec une observation
trans-unit.note: Spaces in front of the variables are added automatically
Spaces in front of the variables are added automatically

trans-unit.source: since the beginning of the week
trans-unit.target: depuis le début de la semaine
trans-unit.note: 'includes cases without a note since the beginning of the week'

trans-unit.source: without a note within the last days
trans-unit.target: sans observations au cours des derniers days
trans-unit.note: 'includes cases without a note within the last x days'

trans-unit.source: Our regular monthly meeting. Find the agenda and minutes in our meeting folder.
trans-unit.target: Notre réunion mensuelle régulière. Ordre du jour et retranscription sont dans notre dossier de réunion.

trans-unit.source: Expert conducted a two day workshop on drug prevention.
trans-unit.target: L'expert a dirigé un atelier de deux jours sur la prévention de la toxicomanie.

trans-unit.source: Visited family after we heard that mother is seriously ill. She cannot get up. Children are taking care of housework. Told her to see doctor. We should follow up next week.
trans-unit.target: Visite de la famille après avoir appris que la mère est gravement malade. Elle ne peut pas se lever. Les enfants s'occupent des tâches ménagères. Nous lui avons dit de voir un médecin. Nous devrions faire un suivi la semaine prochaine.

trans-unit.source: Discussed future of the child with the parents. They agree that changing school can be a good option. Will discuss further together with the child.
trans-unit.target: Discussion sur l'avenir de l'enfant avec ses parents. Ils sont d'accord sur l'idée que changer d'école peut être une bonne option. Continuerons d'en discuter avec l'enfant.

trans-unit.source: Called to ask for reason about absence. Mother made excuses but promised to send the child tomorrow.
trans-unit.target: J'ai appelé pour demander la raison de l'absence. La mère s'est excusée mais a promis d'envoyer l'enfant demain.

trans-unit.source: Mother has called in the morning. Child cannot come to class because of fever.
trans-unit.target: La mère a appelé dans la matinée. L'enfant ne peut pas venir à cause d'une fièvre.

trans-unit.source: Child was not in school whole last week again. When calling the mother she didn't know about it. Need to follow up urgently to discuss with the child and the guardians.
trans-unit.target: L'enfant n'était à nouveau pas à l'école toute la semaine dernière. Lorsque nous avons appelé la mère, elle n'était pas au courant. Besoin d'un suivi urgent pour en discuter avec l'enfant et les tuteurs.
L'école est satisfaite du progrès qui a été fait

trans-unit.source: Visited the school and talked to the class teacher and principal. They are happy about the progress and behaviour.
trans-unit.target: J'ai visité l'école et j'ai parlé à l'enseignant et au directeur. Ils sont satisfaits des progrès et du comportement de l'enfant en ce moment.

trans-unit.source: Needs to work more for school
Discussed the child's progress with coaching teacher. He is still a weak student and needs more support. We should consider arranging an extra class for him. Discuss next social worker meeting.
trans-unit.target: J'ai discuté des progrès de l'enfant avec le professeur d'encadrement. Il reste un élève relativement faible et a besoin de plus de soutien. Nous devrions envisager d'organiser une classe supplémentaire pour lui. Prochaine réunion avec les travailleurs sociaux pour en discuter.

trans-unit.source: Principal called us today. Our student got into a fight and was suspended for a week. Need to follow up with the child and discuss the matter.
trans-unit.target: Le principal nous a appelé aujourd'hui. Notre élève s'est battu et a été exclu pour une semaine. Il faut faire un suivi avec l'enfant et discuter de l'affaire.

trans-unit.source: Since the father has lost his job the family is struggling to survive. After home visits and discussion in our team we decided to refer them to a special support programme.
trans-unit.target: Depuis que le père a perdu son emploi, la famille a du mal à survivre. Après des visites à domicile et des discussions au sein de notre équipe, nous avons décidé de les orienter vers un programme de soutien spécial.

trans-unit.source: Child has failed this school year as she did not go to school regularly. After a long discussion with the child and her parents we agreed to support her to repeat the class and she promised to attend school regularly.
trans-unit.target: L'enfant a échoué cette année scolaire du fait d'absences répétées. Après une longue discussion avec l'enfant et ses parents, nous avons accepté de l'aider à redoubler et elle a promis d'aller régulièrement à l'école.

trans-unit.source: Teacher has let us know that he is very unfocused during class these days. Discussed with him - there are a lot of problems in the family currently.
trans-unit.target: Le professeur nous a informé qu'il manque de concentration en classe ces temps-ci. En avons discuté avec lui - la famille a beaucoup de problèmes en ce moment.

trans-unit.source: She refused to listen to the teacher was disturbing the class. Did counselling session with her.
trans-unit.target: Elle refuse d'écouter le professeur et dérange la classe. Avons fait une session de thérapie avec elle.

trans-unit.note: events are related to a child
Slider that allows a user to also include events

trans-unit.target: You can edit how users will see the details of a single record of this type. Drag and drop fields and sections in this preview of a profile view and group them as appropriate. trans-unit.source:
# Welcome to Aam Digital! We are here to help you manage your participants' or beneficiaries' details and your team's interactions with them.
The Aam Digital platform is very flexible and you can customize the structures and views to exactly fit your project needs. The following steps guide you through the most important configuration options for this. And you can start working with your data within a few minutes already.
We also have some short video guides for you: [Aam Digital Video Guides (YouTube)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZSFOX_MBa8zz5Mtfv_qlnA/videos)
Feel free to leave this setup wizard in between to explore the existing system first. You can always come back to this view through the "Setup Wizard" button at the bottom of the main menu on the left. To dismiss and hide this wizard, go to the last step of the wizard and "finish" the setup process.
trans-unit.target:
# Welcome to Aam Digital! We are here to help you manage your participants' or beneficiaries' details and your team's interactions with them.
The Aam Digital platform is very flexible and you can customize the structures and views to exactly fit your project needs. The following steps guide you through the most important configuration options for this. And you can start working with your data within a few minutes already.
We also have some short video guides for you: [Aam Digital Video Guides (YouTube)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZSFOX_MBa8zz5Mtfv_qlnA/videos)
Feel free to leave this setup wizard in between to explore the existing system first. You can always come back to this view through the "Setup Wizard" button at the bottom of the main menu on the left. To dismiss and hide this wizard, go to the last step of the wizard and "finish" the setup process.

trans-unit.source:
The system already holds some basic structures for your case management. You can adapt the fields and how the details are displayed.
If you have further requirements, don't hesitate to reach out to us at [support@aam-digital.com](mailto:support@aam-digital.com).
_Please note that the setup wizard and form builder is still under active development ("beta" version). Some advanced configuration options are not available here yet for you to configure yourself and may need assistance from the tech support team. We are currently extending and optimizing the user interfaces for these steps._
trans-unit.target:
The system already holds some basic structures for your case management. You can adapt the fields and how the details are displayed.
If you have further requirements, don't hesitate to reach out to us at [support@aam-digital.com](mailto:support@aam-digital.com).
_Please note that the setup wizard and form builder is still under active development ("beta" version). Some advanced configuration options are not available here yet for you to configure yourself and may need assistance from the tech support team. We are currently extending and optimizing the user interfaces for these steps._

trans-unit.source: You can collaborate on Aam Digital as a team. Data is synced and all users have access to the latest information.
trans-unit.target: You can collaborate on Aam Digital as a team. Data is synced and all users have access to the latest information.

trans-unit.source: If you have exising data from a previous system, you can easily import it. Save the data in ".csv" format (e.g. from MS Excel). You do not need any specific column names in your file to be imported. The Import Module helps your map your spreadsheet data to the relevant fields in your Aam Digital profiles.
trans-unit.target: If you have exising data from a previous system, you can easily import it. Save the data in ".csv" format (e.g. from MS Excel). You do not need any specific column names in your file to be imported. The Import Module helps your map your spreadsheet data to the relevant fields in your Aam Digital profiles.

trans-unit.source:
That's it. You are ready to explore your system and start work!
You can always adapt your setup further, after you started using it. We recommend to keep things simple in the beginning, start using it for some of your tasks and then add further fields and adjust your setup.
Feel free to reach out to us with your questions or feedback: [support@aam-digital.com](mailto:support@aam-digital.com)
trans-unit.target:
That's it. You are ready to explore your system and start work!
You can always adapt your setup further, after you started using it. We recommend to keep things simple in the beginning, start using it for some of your tasks and then add further fields and adjust your setup.
Feel free to reach out to us with your questions or feedback: [support@aam-digital.com](mailto:support@aam-digital.com)

trans-unit.source: We will hide the setup wizard from the main menu as you finish it here. You can still access it from the admin screen.
trans-unit.target: We will hide the setup wizard from the main menu as you finish it here. You can still access it from the admin screen.

trans-unit.source: Select multiple records for bulk actions like duplicating or deleting
trans-unit.target: Select multiple records for bulk actions like duplicating or deleting

trans-unit.source: Select rows for an action on multiple records
trans-unit.target: Select rows for an action on multiple records

trans-unit.source: Mark the record as inactive, hiding it from lists by default while keeping the data.
trans-unit.target: Mark the record as inactive, hiding it from lists by default while keeping the data.

trans-unit.source: Remove all personal data and keep an archived basic record for statistical reporting.
trans-unit.target: Remove all personal data and keep an archived basic record for statistical reporting.

trans-unit.source: Remove the record completely from the database.
trans-unit.target: Remove the record completely from the database.

trans-unit.source:
This will remove the data permanently as if it never existed. This cannot be undone. Statistical reports (also for past time periods) will change and not include this record anymore.
If you have not just created a record accidentally, deleting this is probably not what you want to do. If a record represents something that actually happened in your work, consider to use "anonymize" or just "archive" instead, so that you will not lose your documentation for reports.
Are you sure you want to delete ?
trans-unit.target:
This will remove the data permanently as if it never existed. This cannot be undone. Statistical reports (also for past time periods) will change and not include this record anymore.
If you have not just created a record accidentally, deleting this is probably not what you want to do. If a record represents something that actually happened in your work, consider to use "anonymize" or just "archive" instead, so that you will not lose your documentation for reports.
Are you sure you want to delete ?

trans-unit.source: Related records may still contain personal data
trans-unit.target: Related records may still contain personal data

trans-unit.source: Some related records (e.g. notes) may still contain personal data in their text. We have automatically deleted all records that are linked to ONLY . However, there are some records that are linked to multiple records. We have not deleted these, so that you will not lose relevant data. Please review them manually to ensure all sensitive information is removed, if required (e.g. by looking through the linked notes and editing a note's text).
trans-unit.target: Some related records (e.g. notes) may still contain personal data in their text. We have automatically deleted all records that are linked to ONLY . However, there are some records that are linked to multiple records. We have not deleted these, so that you will not lose relevant data. Please review them manually to ensure all sensitive information is removed, if required (e.g. by looking through the linked notes and editing a note's text).

trans-unit.source:
This will remove all personal information (PII) permanently and keep only a basic record for statistical reports. Details that are removed during anonymization cannot be recovered.
If a record has only become inactive and you want to keep all details, consider to use "archive" instead.
Are you sure you want to anonymize ?
trans-unit.target:
This will remove all personal information (PII) permanently and keep only a basic record for statistical reports. Details that are removed during anonymization cannot be recovered.
If a record has only become inactive and you want to keep all details, consider to use "archive" instead.
Are you sure you want to anonymize ?

trans-unit.source: Some related records (e.g. notes) may still contain personal data in their text. We have automatically anonymized all records that are linked to ONLY . However, there are some records that are linked to multiple records. We have not anonymized these, so that you will not lose relevant data. Please review them manually to ensure all sensitive information is removed (e.g. by looking through the linked notes and editing a note's text).
trans-unit.target: Some related records (e.g. notes) may still contain personal data in their text. We have automatically anonymized all records that are linked to ONLY . However, there are some records that are linked to multiple records. We have not anonymized these, so that you will not lose relevant data. Please review them manually to ensure all sensitive information is removed (e.g. by looking through the linked notes and editing a note's text).

trans-unit.source: You are about to modify the selected records. This action will apply changes across multiple entries. Make sure that the fields you are updating reflect the correct information for all selected records. If you are unsure about making changes across all these records, review your selection carefully before proceeding or edit the records individually.
trans-unit.target: You are about to modify the selected records. This action will apply changes across multiple entries. Make sure that the fields you are updating reflect the correct information for all selected records. If you are unsure about making changes across all these records, review your selection carefully before proceeding or edit the records individually.

trans-unit.source: The form below lists all columns from your imported file. Select a property of the record type in the system, into which you want to import each column. You can also omit some columns. If you do not select anything for a column, that column will be ignored during the import. For advanced types, use the button next to the field to configure how values are transformed.
trans-unit.target: The form below lists all columns from your imported file. Select a property of the record type in the system, into which you want to import each column. You can also omit some columns. If you do not select anything for a column, that column will be ignored during the import. For advanced types, use the button next to the field to configure how values are transformed.

trans-unit.source: Preparing data for preview and import ...
trans-unit.target: Preparing data for preview and import ...

trans-unit.source: Review your mapped data to be imported:
trans-unit.target: Review your mapped data to be imported:

trans-unit.source: The data previewed here is mapped and transformed according to the 'Column Mapping' you defined in the previous step. Only columns for which you selected a field there will be imported and appears here in this preview. If necessary, you can go back to the previous step and make changes to the mapping.
trans-unit.target: The data previewed here is mapped and transformed according to the 'Column Mapping' you defined in the previous step. Only columns for which you selected a field there will be imported and appears here in this preview. If necessary, you can go back to the previous step and make changes to the mapping.

trans-unit.source: In addition to creating new records directly for the imported data you can also define additional actions (e.g. to make all imported records members of an existing activity or group). trans-unit.source: Select the template based on which to generate a file for the current record or configure available templates.
trans-unit.target: Select the template based on which to generate a file for the current record or configure available templates.

trans-unit.source: Upload a specially prepared document that contains placeholders, which will be replace with actual data from a specific entity when generating a PDF.
trans-unit.target: Upload a specially prepared document that contains placeholders, which will be replace with actual data from a specific entity when generating a PDF.

trans-unit.source: File name pattern for generated file
trans-unit.target: File name pattern for generated file

trans-unit.source: The filename for the resulting file when using this template. You can use the same placeholders here as in the template file itself (e.g. "my-report_{d.name}.pdf").
trans-unit.target: The filename for the resulting file when using this template. You can use the same placeholders here as in the template file itself (e.g. "my-report_{d.name}.pdf").

trans-unit.source: Create a file based on a selected template.
trans-unit.target: Create a file based on a selected template.

trans-unit.source:
Upload a specially prepared template file here. The file can contain placeholders that will be replaced with actual data when a file is generated for a selected record. For example {d.name} will be replaced with the value in the "name" field of the given entity. See the documentation of the [carbone system](https://carbone.io/documentation.html#substitutions) for more information.
The placeholder keys must match the field "Field ID" of the record data structure in Aam Digital. You can find this in the Admin UI form builder (Edit Data Structure -> Details View) and edit a specific field to view its details.
Template files can be in most office document formats (odt, docx, ods, xlsx, odp, pptx) or PDF.
trans-unit.target:
Upload a specially prepared template file here. The file can contain placeholders that will be replaced with actual data when a file is generated for a selected record. For example {d.name} will be replaced with the value in the "name" field of the given entity. See the documentation of the [carbone system](https://carbone.io/documentation.html#substitutions) for more information.
The placeholder keys must match the field "Field ID" of the record data structure in Aam Digital. You can find this in the Admin UI form builder (Edit Data Structure -> Details View) and edit a specific field to view its details.
Template files can be in most office document formats (odt, docx, ods, xlsx, odp, pptx) or PDF.

trans-unit.source: You can edit how users will see the details of this public form. To edit fields, click on the Edit button, make your changes, and then save. These changes will reflect on the public form. Drag and drop fields and sections in this preview of a profile view. The editor below closely resembles how the form will look for users later. Forms show all fields below each other not in multiple columns, however.
trans-unit.target: You can edit how users will see the details of this public form. To edit fields, click on the Edit button, make your changes, and then save. These changes will reflect on the public form. Drag and drop fields and sections in this preview of a profile view. The editor below closely resembles how the form will look for users later. Forms show all fields below each other not in multiple columns, however.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that is part of the link (URL) through which users can access this form (e.g. demo.aam-digital.com/public-form/MY_FORM_LINK_ID)

trans-unit.source: The type of record that is created when a someone submits the form (e.g. if you select "Note" here, the form will create new entries in your "Notes List" and you can select only fields of your "Note" data structure for this form)

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, you do not have the required permissions to submit data through this form. Please contact the person who shared this link with you. In case you have a user account, please make sure you are logged in.
trans-unit.target: Unfortunately, you do not have the required permissions to submit data through this form. Please contact the person who shared this link with you. In case you have a user account, please make sure you are logged in.

trans-unit.source: If you want external people filling this form without logging in, the Permission System also has to allow "public" users to create new records of this type. If you are seeing problems submitting the form, please contact your technical support team.
